citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
The current animal pharmacy area is stocked with a large supply of varied medications. Some are missing labels or the
label has been worn away; some medications are expired however it is unclear whether they are in use. Two medications
that are currently being used for the specific treatment of individual animals have labels from the veterinarian, however
the date on the prescription label is incomplete.
Incomplete or unclear labeling of medications and/or the use of expired medications could lead to ineffective prevention
and treatment of disease and potential harm to an animal. Correct by using appropriate methods to prevent, control and
treat disease – including organization and labeling of medications to ensure the accuracy and efficacy of these methods.
Correct by February 29, 2024.

citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The facility does not have an environmental enhancement plan for birds. An environmental enhancement plan must be
developed, documented, and approved by the attending veterinarian so as to promote the health and psychological well-
being of birds.
Correct by ensuring that a complete, documented plan for environmental enhancement, that addresses the required
elements and is approved by the attending veterinarian, is maintained and available for inspection. Correct by March 31,
2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.40(b)(2) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
The current animal pharmacy area is stocked with a large supply of varied medications. Some are missing labels or the 
label has been worn away; some medications are expired however it is unclear whether they are in use. Two medications 
that are currently being used for the specific treatment of individual animals have labels from the veterinarian, however 
the date on the prescription label is incomplete. 
 
Incomplete or unclear labeling of medications and/or the use of expired medications could lead to ineffective prevention 
and treatment of disease and potential harm to an animal. Correct by using appropriate methods to prevent, control and 
treat disease – including organization and labeling of medications to ensure the accuracy and efficacy of these methods. 
Correct by February 29, 2024. 
3.154 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
The facility does not have an environmental enhancement plan for birds. An environmental enhancement plan must be 
developed, documented, and approved by the attending veterinarian so as to promote the health and psychological well-
being of birds.  
 
Correct by ensuring that a complete, documented plan for environmental enhancement, that addresses the required 
elements and is approved by the attending veterinarian, is maintained and available for inspection. Correct by March 31, 
2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
